reviews.text: Friendly service but the food was a hit & miss. A starter called focaccia wasn’t that but more a pizza with topics. 2 dishes of pasta we had were good. One dessert- cheesecake was good but tiramisu wasn’t. Overall I would say average Italian food- we are used to much better food in our travels and at home in London

Wow… what a find in Seville for the Gluten Free people. Amazing pizza, best dessert I’ve ever had in any country and fantastic drinks! The placemat of different colors keeps you safe because everyone knows you’re GF. Thank you Al Solito Posto

GF menu was a hit, it has been a bit difficult finding menus that offer good choices but this restaurant did not disappoint.  They had several choices, and the food was really good.  (only the burata is GF in this photo, I forgot to take a pic of my pizza).  We did end up taking a good portion of this pizza back to the apartment we rented out and heated it up and it was just as good the next day - so double thumbs up for that.

Had breakfast earlier today, yogurt with fruits and some avocado on the side. Super tasty and nice. Also nice fresh orange juice. I recommend the place. Forgot to take picture of the food but here I leave part of the menu.

Edit. Went again today, 10.5 euros for all of the above and definitely worth it.
One of the best restaurant. The food it's delicios, so tasty and quality (and the portions big enough to get full) Really recommend! You won't regret!
